content.description: Sit start up the overhanging arete. This boulder is known as the Riverside Bloc. Access is after runoff, usually in late June.
content.protection: You may want a pad, but the pebbly beach at the base is pretty forgiving.
content.location: Go 1/3 mile past West Fork bridge. Pull over at the wide spot on the road. The boulder is down on the river to your left. It is a sweet location, and there is a great little pool to keep your libations chill. There is nice fishing as well. Directly across the river is a tall, narrow spire.

content.description:
On Riverside Bloc, this is 5 feet left of

Fishing For Flies

and goes up obvious knobs in the trough.
This problem ascends sidepulls and thin feet up center of the roadside face. Keep a tight core to avoid the barndoor at the start. Do not use arete to right.
content.location: Find this boulder 1/3rd of a mile past West Fork Campground. Use the pullout on the left for parking. The boulder is 30 feet up the road on the right. As the name suggest, it is roadside.

content.description:
On Riverside Bloc, this is the blunt arete left of

Three Pound Brown

.

Sit start at far left of north side by tree to traverse through the overhang across roadside face to end on

Flea Circus

. The crux is moving onto roadside face. Using the lip through the overhang makes this quite a bit easier. A few years back some moron chipped the key hold at the move onto the roadside face. This did not change the grade but made the hold a little painful. Thanks a lot, ya jerk!

Sit start left to right traverse. The crux is going for lip at the finish. It is not much of a boulder, but it is a surprisingly fun problem. This rock is known as Slant Boulder. You do not get to use the lip until the finish.
content.location: This is just past mile marker 2 on the right side 40 feet of the road. Look for the overhanging boulder.

content.description:
This climbs the arete right of

Roadside Attraction

. It is good fun for the grade. A sit start makes this a little harder, maybe V1.

On Riverside Bloc, sit start on

Water Music

, then go out left onto the face to the finish. This problem would earn more stars but is fairly sharp (painful).
Sit start to crux lip encounter on north face of Roadside Attraction Boulder. This is a great problem, I only wish it was taller.
This is another roadside boulder offering many variations for the beginner. You will stand in the road to start or spot on this boulder. The center problem through the obvious pocket is the best.
content.location: It is a couple hundred feet up the road from mile marker 2 on the left side.

content.description:
This is found on Riverside Bloc. Traverse left to right to finish on

Water Music

or around the corner to an easier finish.
